title: Thanks for the Omega Teemo Skin
body: Nice job on the skin.  I've enjoyed it since its first release.  I was afraid he would be too dark and evil, but he fits the war-torn vet well.  The quips when you buy a major item are great, and his general talk fits the theme well.

replies.body:
Hiya Cornerstone1, 

So glad to hear you like him! ^-^ 

What's your favorite voice line? One of my favorites is, "You'd be surprised how quick fur ignites." :3
"Well, time to put on my killing hat" -Teemo, upon buying a {{item:3089}}
(dark deep voice, even though you are teemo and your voice is at one of the highest frequencies) War didn't change me...I changed war.
The first time I saw this skin in game the sound scared the hell outta me when I stepped on  his mushrooms  xD
I think the voice over fits him better. in his lore he changes from happy to well, not happy when he goes into battle. and being on the rift is a type of battle
"Next time I see Nashor, I'll yank a couple more", when buying {{item:3115}}
I like Teemo's kit, but I almost have to mute the game when playing him because I hate his standard voice over (it's a good VO, I just hate it).  I should probably buy this skin soon...

Honestly though, by far the best part of that skin is the recall animation.

I didn't even buy it for myself because I hate Teemo, but I did buy it for a friend because he also hates Teemo and now I can force him to play it.
Another reason to play Teemo is not a good thing goddamnit
